thread.title: Want More Proof Love Still Exists?
thread.title_full: Want More Proof Love Still Exists?

author: Perez Hilton
title: Want More Proof Love Still Exists?
text:
We've got some!
Justin Timberlake 's affections for wife and baby momma Jessica Biel grow more and more with every passing year.
Photos: 15 Times JT & JB Packed On The PDA 
And to show it, the Memphis-repping singer took time out of his schedule Friday to pen a touching love letter for the actress' 35th birthday.
Ch-ch-check out the sweet message he shared via Instagram (below)! 
You make me laugh. You make me smile. You make me LOVE. You make me want to be BETTER. Speaking of, it doesn't get any BETTER than you... Now, I know for sure that it's BETTER to be lucky than good. Ask me who the luckiest guy in the world is and I will tell you that you are looking at him. Happy Birthday, my heart. --J A post shared by Justin Timberlake (@justintimberlake) on Mar 3, 2017 at 4:21pm PST 
Please stay together forever, guys. Hollywood needs it!
No pressure or anything...
[ Image via Instagram .]
